title: [K-12] Personalized Implicit Memory-Based Social Learning Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and general understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Static cue-based simulation design for low-attention learners in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% situational awareness accuracy by applying implicit memory strategies in social issue scenarios
Learners reduce simulation task completion time by 20% through static cue systems tailored to individual attention levels
Through VR-based collaborative activities, learners propose three actionable solutions for addressing community issues

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
